com.frankly.franklysdk.authenticate

Interface IdentityTokenGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseIdentityTokenGenerator, InsecureIdentityTokenGenerator

    public interface IdentityTokenGenerator
    Generates a new identity token on demand.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • generateIdentityToken

        String generateIdentityToken(android.content.Context context,
                             String nonce)
                      throws IOException
        Generates a new identity token for the user.
        Parameters:
        context - The application context.
        nonce - A unique value that is used to protect against man-in-the-middle attacks.
        Returns:
        The generated identity token.
        Throws:
        IOException

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The value of the attribute, or null if none was set.

        Returns the username defined by the partner.

      • getRole

        User.Role getRole()
        Obtains the user's role.
        Returns:
        The role of the current user.

      • setRole

        Defines the user's role.
        Parameters:
        role - The role of the user.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - The role is unsupported.

      • supported

        boolean supported(User.Role role)
        Tests if a User.Role is supported.
        Parameters:
        role - The role of the user.
        Returns:
        True if the role is supported.
